Title: What Lies Ahead
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (series of graphic novels), Tony Moore (series of graphic novels), Charlie Adlard (series of graphic novels), Frank Darabont, Robert Kirkman
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Jon Bernthal, Sarah Wayne Callies, Laurie Holden
Plot: The group's plan to head for Fort Benning is put on hold when Sophia goes missing.
